item.title: Release Notes Samples
item.description: Product Release Notes Hotfix Release Notes Product Release Notes This writing sample is a set of release notes for a patch release that introduces a couple new features, information about forthcoming features, and setup (system version) requrements. This was produced with MadCap Flare, and showcases templating and conditional output for specific products and audiences. Hotfix Release Notes
